HomePage.about_description: I'm Alireza — a front-end designer and developer who loves bringing ideas to life. I've been working in the web world for a few years, using tools like React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and more. For me, good design is not just about looks — it's about how it works and feels for the user.

AboutPage.details_description: I’m Alireza. I pay attention to details and value organization in my work. I always believe that small things can have a bigger impact. I stay calm in the face of challenges and enjoy solving problems. Working in a team is very enjoyable for me, and I love brainstorming with different people. I live in Tehran and have been involved in web design for several years. I’m always looking for opportunities to grow and learn more.
